abstract: Thousands gather in Sichuan Province to protest death of Tibetan spiritual leader Tenzin Delek Rinpoche in Chinese jail; demand that Chinese authorities hand over monk's body to family for funeral rights.
lead_paragraph: The police fired shots into the air, used tear gas and beat demonstrators to disperse the crowds, an advocacy group said.

headline.main: Protesters Seek Return of Body of Tibetan Monk Who Died in Jail
headline.print_headline: Monk’s Death in Chinese Jail Stirs Protest

snippet: The police fired shots into the air, used tear gas and beat demonstrators to disperse the crowds, an advocacy group said.
